svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
April 1, 2023" date: "2023-04-01"
Eth News and Links
Shapella (Shanghai + Capella) upgrade
* Update your nodes ready for mainnet Shapella upgrade on April 12 , including both
your beacon node & validator client
Update your nodes ready for mainnet Shapella upgrade on April 12 , including both your
beacon node & validator client
* Consensus layer mainnet releases: Lighthouse v4.0.1 Lodestar v1.7.2 Nimbus v23.3.2
Prysm v4.0.1 Teku v23.3.1

* Besu v23.1.2

MEV-Boost v1.5.0
* Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Summary by Tim Beiko .Â Notes
from Tim Beiko & Christine Kim : Final Shapella mainnet shadow fork planned for next
week Flag for EL to suggest CL override external builder to be added before Cancun
SELFDESTRUCT removal (EIP6780) added as Cancun candidate EOF spec updated to avoid code
& gas observability, too big to include in Cancun Proposal for trust-minimized CL
access from EL inside the EVM Verkle trees readiness discussion for Prague upgrade
Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Summary by Tim Beiko .Â Notes from
Tim Beiko & Christine Kim :
* Final Shapella mainnet shadow fork planned for next week
Final Shapella mainnet shadow fork planned for next week
* Flag for EL to suggest CL override external builder to be added before Cancun
Flag for EL to suggest CL override external builder to be added before Cancun
* SELFDESTRUCT removal (EIP6780) added as Cancun candidate
SELFDESTRUCT removal (EIP6780) added as Cancun candidate
* EOF spec updated to avoid code & gas observability, too big to include in Cancun
EOF spec updated to avoid code & gas observability, too big to include in Cancun
* Proposal for trust-minimized CL access from EL inside the EVM
Proposal for trust-minimized CL access from EL inside the EVM
* Verkle trees readiness discussion for Prague upgrade
Verkle trees readiness discussion for Prague upgrade
* EF mainnet Shapella announcement
EF mainnet Shapella announcement
For Stakers
* Beacon chain withdrawals technical explainer When to broadcast BLS address change
Beacon chain withdrawals technical explainer

* Switch to a smaller pool after Shapella to make Ethereum more resilient
Switch to a smaller pool after Shapella to make Ethereum more resilient
* Orange Pi 5 running Geth+Lighthouse , 139 â‚¬, syncs in ~27 hours
Orange Pi 5 running Geth+Lighthouse , 139 â‚¬, syncs in ~27 hours
* Mac mini M1 running Geth+Nimbus , syncs in ~18 hours
Mac mini M1 running Geth+Nimbus , syncs in ~18 hours
Layer 2
* Polygon zkEVM mainnet beta , gas pricing as EVM but lacks some precompiles, Security
Council initially, AGPL v3 license
Polygon zkEVM mainnet beta , gas pricing as EVM but lacks some precompiles, Security
* Linea (ConsenSys zkEVM) testnet now public
Linea (ConsenSys zkEVM) testnet now public
* Conduit managed rollups using OP Stack, with block explorer, RPCs, metrics &
transaction tracer
Conduit managed rollups using OP Stack, with block explorer, RPCs, metrics &
* L2BEAT risk rosette : visualization of risks
L2BEAT risk rosette : visualization of risks
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs: EIP6780 : SELFDESTRUCT only in same transaction EIP6789 : Rename gas to mana
[resurrected EIP102] EIP6800 : Ethereum state using a unified verkle tree
EIPs:
* EIP6780 : SELFDESTRUCT only in same transaction
EIP6780 : SELFDESTRUCT only in same transaction
* EIP6789 : Rename gas to mana [resurrected EIP102]
EIP6789 : Rename gas to mana [resurrected EIP102]
* EIP6800 : Ethereum state using a unified verkle tree
EIP6800 : Ethereum state using a unified verkle tree
* ERCs: ERC6785 : ERC721 utilities extension ERC6786 : Registry for royalties payment
for NFTs ERC6787 : Order book DEX with two phase withdrawal ERC6806 : ERC721 holding
time tracking ERC6808 : Fungible key bound token ERC6809 : Non-fungible key bound token
ERCs:
* ERC6785 : ERC721 utilities extension
ERC6785 : ERC721 utilities extension
* ERC6786 : Registry for royalties payment for NFTs
ERC6786 : Registry for royalties payment for NFTs
* ERC6787 : Order book DEX with two phase withdrawal
ERC6787 : Order book DEX with two phase withdrawal
* ERC6806 : ERC721 holding time tracking
ERC6806 : ERC721 holding time tracking
* ERC6808 : Fungible key bound token
ERC6808 : Fungible key bound token
* ERC6809 : Non-fungible key bound token
ERC6809 : Non-fungible key bound token
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Scaffold-Eth-2 hackathon !
BuidlGuidl presents: Scaffold-Eth 2 hackathon .
This is a great opportunity to build a prototype in a few days. There's no sign-up
required, simply build something & submit it before April 8.
You can hack solo, bring a crew, or find a friend in the Telegram Group to work with.
To submit your project, all you need to do is record a short video showcasing your app
and add it to the top of the README.md file in your repo along with the live URL.
Submissions open on April 7.
Stuff for developers
* Foundry tip: warp to present time in base test setup function for more realistic
testing
Foundry tip: warp to present time in base test setup function for more realistic
* Vulcan template : Foundry template using Vulcan development framework
Vulcan template : Foundry template using Vulcan development framework
* Protect against donation attacks on ERC4626 vaults & liquidity pools
Protect against donation attacks on ERC4626 vaults & liquidity pools
* Gambit : Solidity mutation generator in Rust, integrated with Certora Prover
Gambit : Solidity mutation generator in Rust, integrated with Certora Prover
* Curta CTF: what are buckets solution
Curta CTF: what are buckets solution
* Decipher EVM puzzles : extension of Francoâ€™s EVM puzzles
Decipher EVM puzzles : extension of Francoâ€™s EVM puzzles
* Ethereum-indexer : in-browser indexer in TypeScript for use in games/apps, demo
Ethereum-indexer : in-browser indexer in TypeScript for use in games/apps, demo
* P256 on EVM : demo of user onboarding, wallet creation using WebAuthn
P256 on EVM : demo of user onboarding, wallet creation using WebAuthn
* Arbiter v0.1.0 : agent based analysis tool in Rust, beta
Arbiter v0.1.0 : agent based analysis tool in Rust, beta
* Ethereum Attestation Service private data attestations using Merkle Trees
Ethereum Attestation Service private data attestations using Merkle Trees
Security
* Tincho found ENS DNSSEC vulnerability in undeployed code, any DNSSEC name could be
taken over, 100k bounty recommended
Tincho found ENS DNSSEC vulnerability in undeployed code, any DNSSEC name could be
* DAO gas refund vulnerability , refund pots can be drained for DAOs with inexpensive
tokens
DAO gas refund vulnerability , refund pots can be drained for DAOs with inexpensive
* Euler exploiter returning funds
Euler exploiter returning funds
* Overview of sleuthing tools : Phalcon, MetaSleuth, Transaction tracer, ethtx and
Tenderly
Overview of sleuthing tools : Phalcon, MetaSleuth, Transaction tracer, ethtx and
Ecosystem
* Optimismâ€™s retroactive public goods funding round 2 recipients announced , 10 million
OP shared by 195 projects
Optimismâ€™s retroactive public goods funding round 2 recipients announced , 10 million
* Vitalik: SNARK-verify layer 1 using multiple Type 1 zkEVMs
Vitalik: SNARK-verify layer 1 using multiple Type 1 zkEVMs
* Etherscan adds option to use local time zone for time stamps
Etherscan adds option to use local time zone for time stamps
* ETHGlobal Scaling Ethereum finalists
ETHGlobal Scaling Ethereum finalists
Enterprise
* Ticketmaster testing NFT gated ticket sales with metal band Avenged Sevenfold
Notable at app layer
* Maker voted for its constitution
Maker voted for its constitution
* DeFi Saver adds limit orders & DCA strategies
DeFi Saver adds limit orders & DCA strategies
* Sound Swap (music NFTs): 24 hour open editions & increasing price mints with instant
selling
Sound Swap (music NFTs): 24 hour open editions & increasing price mints with instant
Job Listings
* EF Ecosystem Support Program seek a Grant Analyst & Liaison
EF Ecosystem Support Program seek a Grant Analyst & Liaison
* Nimbus is hiring a Site Reliability Engineer
Nimbus is hiring a Site Reliability Engineer
* L2BEAT ðŸ’— is hiring a Senior Software Engineer & Product Owner. Apply here!
L2BEAT ðŸ’— is hiring a Senior Software Engineer & Product Owner. Apply here!
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth.
Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* CFTC charged Binance & CZ with law evasion & operating illegal derivatives exchange
CFTC charged Binance & CZ with law evasion & operating illegal derivatives exchange
* FDIC wants former Signature Bank crypto customers to cash out by April 5
FDIC wants former Signature Bank crypto customers to cash out by April 5
* Bittrex exchange shutting US operations due to regulatory uncertainty
Bittrex exchange shutting US operations due to regulatory uncertainty
* NFT MEV strategies : mints, arbitrage & liquidations
NFT MEV strategies : mints, arbitrage & liquidations
General/crypto
* Near-Ultrasound Inaudible Trojan : play commands at 16kHz-20kHz to attack voice
assistants
Near-Ultrasound Inaudible Trojan : play commands at 16kHz-20kHz to attack voice
* Bing CMS exploit allowed take over of Office 365 accounts
Bing CMS exploit allowed take over of Office 365 accounts
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in real time.
Permalink for this weekâ€™s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-april-1-2023
